abstract: During his 40-year career, Gary P. Naftalis has defended embattled executives, troubled multibillion-dollar banks and disco owners. Now he defends Rajat K. Gupta.
snippet: During his 40-year career, Gary P. Naftalis has defended embattled executives, troubled multibillion-dollar banks and disco owners. Now he defends Rajat K. Gupta.

headline.main: A Litigator Known as Columbo With a Law Degree
headline.print_headline: A Litigator Known as Columbo With a Law Degree
